properties.schema-text:
{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "ralis_category_info_row",
  "fields": [
    {"name":"application_id",  "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"category_key",    "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"idx",             "type":["null","int"],    "default": null},

    {"name":"hscode",          "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"description",     "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"quantity",        "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"quantity_units",  "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"plant_name",      "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"botanical_name",  "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"production_location","type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"inputs_used",     "type":["null","string"], "default": null},

    {"name":"ci",              "type":["null","string"], "default": null}
  ]
}

{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "dw_ralis_all",
  "fields": [
    { "name": "application_id",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "idx",                     "type": ["null","int"],    "default": null },

    { "name": "application_no",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "status_code",             "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "status",                  "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "event_ts",                "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    { "name": "deleted",                 "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "naeb_application",        "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_users_deleted",     "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_categories_deleted","type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_processes_deleted", "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    { "name": "ralis_users_id",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_users_names",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_users_email",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_users_password",    "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_users_checkpoint",  "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_users_date",        "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    { "name": "ralis_categories_id",     "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_categories_name",   "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_categories_type",   "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    { "name": "ralis_processes_id",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_processes_name",    "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    { "name": "ralis_roles_id",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "ralis_roles_name",        "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    { "name": "category_key",            "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "hscode",                  "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "description",             "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "quantity",                "type": ["null","double"], "default": null },
    { "name": "quantity_units",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "plant_name",              "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "botanical_name",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "production_location",     "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "inputs_used",             "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    /* --- NEW shipment-level fields --- */
    { "name": "packages",                "type": ["null","int"],    "default": null },
    { "name": "packages_type",           "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "packages_type_name",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "country_of_origin",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "country_of_origin_name",  "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "country_of_export",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "country_of_export_name",  "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "country_of_import",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "country_of_import_name",  "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "arrival_time",            "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "importer_name",           "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "importer_address",        "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "importer_phone",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "application_tin",         "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "invoice",                 "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "official_documents",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "items_upload",            "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "consignee_names",         "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "consignee_address",       "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "point_of_exit",           "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "point_of_entry",          "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "means_of_transport",      "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "route_of_export",         "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "export_date",             "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },
    { "name": "import_permit",           "type": ["null","string"], "default": null },

    { "name": "ci_text",                 "type": ["null","string"], "default": null }
  ]
}

{
  "type": "record",
  "name": "ralis_application_rec",
  "fields": [
    {"name":"application_id", "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"application_no", "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"status_code",   "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"status",        "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"event_ts",      "type":["null","string"], "default": null},

    {"name":"deleted",           "type":["null","boolean"], "default": null},
    {"name":"naeb_application",  "type":["null","boolean"], "default": null},

    {"name":"ralis_users_id",         "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_users_names",      "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_users_email",      "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_users_password",   "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_users_role_info",  "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_users_checkpoint", "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_users_date",       "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_users_deleted",    "type":["null","boolean"], "default": null},

    {"name":"ralis_categories_id",         "type":["null","int"],    "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_categories_name",       "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_categories_parameters", "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_categories_type",       "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_categories_deleted",    "type":["null","boolean"], "default": null},

    {"name":"ralis_processes_id",         "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_processes_name",       "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_processes_parameters", "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_processes_deleted",    "type":["null","boolean"], "default": null},

    {"name":"ralis_roles_id",        "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_roles_name",      "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_roles_parameter", "type":["null","string"], "default": null},
    {"name":"ralis_roles_email",     "type":["null","string"], "default": null},

    {"name":"category_info_raw", "type":["null","string"], "default": null}
  ]
}

properties.groovyx-script-body:
import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.InputStreamCallback
import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.OutputStreamCallback
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
import groovy.json.JsonOutput
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets

// ---------- helpers ----------
def toInt(v){ if(v==null) return null; try{ return Integer.valueOf(v.toString()) }catch(e){ return null } }
def toDbl(v){ if(v==null) return null; try{ return Double.valueOf(v.toString()) }catch(e){ return null } }
def sOrNull(v){ v==null ? null : v.toString() }
def asText(v){ v==null ? null : (v instanceof Collection || v instanceof Map ? JsonOutput.toJson(v) : v.toString()) }
def tfStr(v){
  if (v == null) return null
  def s = v.toString().trim().toLowerCase()
  return (s in ['true','1','t','y','yes']) ? 'True' :
         (s in ['false','0','f','n','no']) ? 'False' : null
}
def slug(s){ (s==null ? "unknown" : s.toLowerCase().replaceAll("\\W+","_")) }

// ---------- main ----------
def ff = session.get()
if (!ff) return

try {
  // read one application record (already SplitJson $.results.data[*])
  String rowText = null
  session.read(ff, { inStream -> rowText = new String(inStream.bytes, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) } as InputStreamCallback)
  def row = new JsonSlurper().parseText(rowText) as Map

  // app fields (booleans as "True"/"False" only when present)
  def app = [
    application_id            : sOrNull(row.ralisApplicationId ?: row.ralis_application_id),
    application_no            : sOrNull(row.applicationNo ?: row.application_no),
    status_code               : sOrNull(row.status),
    status                    : (row.status instanceof String && row.status.contains("|")) ? row.status.split("\\|",2)[0] : sOrNull(row.status),
    event_ts                  : sOrNull(row.date),

    deleted                   : tfStr(row.deleted),
    naeb_application          : tfStr(row.naebApplication ?: row.naeb_application),
    ralis_users_deleted       : tfStr(row.ralisUsersDeleted ?: row.ralis_users_deleted),
    ralis_categories_deleted  : tfStr(row.ralisCategoriesDeleted ?: row.ralis_categories_deleted),
    ralis_processes_deleted   : tfStr(row.ralisProcessesDeleted ?: row.ralis_processes_deleted),

    ralis_users_id            : sOrNull(row.ralisUsersId ?: row.ralis_users_id),
    ralis_users_names         : sOrNull(row.ralisUsersNames ?: row.ralis_users_names),
    ralis_users_email         : sOrNull(row.ralisUsersEmail ?: row.ralis_users_email),
    ralis_users_password      : sOrNull(row.ralisUsersPassword ?: row.ralis_users_password),
    ralis_users_checkpoint    : sOrNull(row.ralisUsersCheckpoint ?: row.ralis_users_checkpoint),
    ralis_users_date          : sOrNull(row.ralisUsersDate ?: row.ralis_users_date),

    ralis_categories_id       : sOrNull(row.ralisCategoriesId ?: row.ralis_categories_id),
    ralis_categories_name     : sOrNull(row.ralisCategoriesName ?: row.ralis_categories_name),
    ralis_categories_type     : sOrNull(row.ralisCategoriesType ?: row.ralis_categories_type),

    ralis_processes_id        : sOrNull(row.ralisProcessesId ?: row.ralis_processes_id),
    ralis_processes_name      : sOrNull(row.ralisProcessesName ?: row.ralis_processes_name),

    ralis_roles_id            : sOrNull(row.ralisRolesId ?: row.ralis_roles_id),
    ralis_roles_name          : sOrNull(row.ralisRolesName ?: row.ralis_roles_name)
  ]

  // categoryInfo (may be Map or JSON string)
  def rawCI = row.categoryInfo ?: row.category_info
  def cinfo = [:]
  if (rawCI != null) {
    if (rawCI instanceof Map) cinfo = (Map) rawCI
    else { try { cinfo = (new JsonSlurper().parseText(rawCI.toString())) as Map } catch (ignored) { cinfo = [:] } }
  }

  // derived / general-level fields for shipment
  def ciKey              = slug(app.ralis_categories_name) + "_" + slug(app.ralis_categories_type)
  def hscode             = sOrNull(cinfo.hscode)
  def unitFromGeneral    = sOrNull(cinfo.quantity_unit)

  // Shipment-level fields
  def packagesCount      = toInt(cinfo.packages)
  def packagesType       = sOrNull(cinfo.packages_type)
  def packagesTypeName   = sOrNull(cinfo.packages_type_name)

  def countryOrigin      = sOrNull(cinfo.country_of_origin)
  def countryOriginName  = sOrNull(cinfo.country_of_origin_name)
  def countryExport      = sOrNull(cinfo.country_of_export)
  def countryExportName  = sOrNull(cinfo.country_of_export_name)
  def countryImport      = sOrNull(cinfo.country_of_import)
  def countryImportName  = sOrNull(cinfo.country_of_import_name)

  def arrivalTime        = sOrNull(cinfo.arrival_time ?: cinfo.export_date)
  def importerName       = sOrNull(cinfo.importer_name)
  def importerAddress    = sOrNull(cinfo.importer_address)
  def importerPhone      = sOrNull(cinfo.importer_phone)
  def applicationTin     = sOrNull(cinfo.application_tin)
  def invoice            = asText(cinfo.invoice)
  def officialDocs       = asText(cinfo.official_documents)
  def itemsUpload        = asText(cinfo.items_upload)

  // Extra you requested
  def consigneeNames     = sOrNull(cinfo.consignee_names)
  def consigneeAddress   = sOrNull(cinfo.consignee_address)
  def pointOfExit        = sOrNull(cinfo.point_of_exit)
  def pointOfEntry       = sOrNull(cinfo.point_of_entry)
  def meansOfTransport   = sOrNull(cinfo.means_of_transport)
  def routeOfExport      = sOrNull(cinfo.route_of_export)
  def exportDate         = sOrNull(cinfo.export_date)
  def importPermit       = asText(cinfo.import_permit)

  int emitted = 0

  // 1) items as list of objects
  if (cinfo.items instanceof List && !cinfo.items.isEmpty()) {
    cinfo.items.eachWithIndex { item, i ->
      def outRow = [
        // PKs
        application_id         : app.application_id,
        idx                    : (i+1),

        // app fields
        application_no         : app.application_no,
        status_code            : app.status_code,
        status                 : app.status,
        event_ts               : app.event_ts,

        deleted                : app.deleted,
        naeb_application       : app.naeb_application,
        ralis_users_deleted    : app.ralis_users_deleted,
        ralis_categories_deleted: app.ralis_categories_deleted,
        ralis_processes_deleted: app.ralis_processes_deleted,

        ralis_users_id         : app.ralis_users_id,
        ralis_users_names      : app.ralis_users_names,
        ralis_users_email      : app.ralis_users_email,
        ralis_users_password   : app.ralis_users_password,
        ralis_users_checkpoint : app.ralis_users_checkpoint,
        ralis_users_date       : app.ralis_users_date,

        ralis_categories_id    : app.ralis_categories_id,
        ralis_categories_name  : app.ralis_categories_name,
        ralis_categories_type  : app.ralis_categories_type,

        ralis_processes_id     : app.ralis_processes_id,
        ralis_processes_name   : app.ralis_processes_name,

        ralis_roles_id         : app.ralis_roles_id,
        ralis_roles_name       : app.ralis_roles_name,

        // item/common CI
        category_key           : ciKey,
        hscode                 : hscode,
        description            : sOrNull(item.description),
        quantity               : toDbl(item.quantity),
        quantity_units         : sOrNull(item.quantity_units ?: unitFromGeneral),
        plant_name             : sOrNull(item.plant_name),
        botanical_name         : sOrNull(item.botanical_name),
        production_location    : sOrNull(item.production_location),
        inputs_used            : sOrNull(item.inputs_used),

        // shipment fields (NULL if missing  no forced defaults)
        packages               : packagesCount,
        packages_type          : packagesType,
        packages_type_name     : packagesTypeName,
        country_of_origin      : countryOrigin,
        country_of_origin_name : countryOriginName,
        country_of_export      : countryExport,
        country_of_export_name : countryExportName,
        country_of_import      : countryImport,
        country_of_import_name : countryImportName,
        arrival_time           : arrivalTime,
        importer_name          : importerName,
        importer_address       : importerAddress,
        importer_phone         : importerPhone,
        application_tin        : applicationTin,
        invoice                : invoice,
        official_documents     : officialDocs,
        items_upload           : itemsUpload,

        // extra shipment fields
        consignee_names        : consigneeNames,
        consignee_address      : consigneeAddress,
        point_of_exit          : pointOfExit,
        point_of_entry         : pointOfEntry,
        means_of_transport     : meansOfTransport,
        route_of_export        : routeOfExport,
        export_date            : exportDate,
        import_permit          : importPermit,

        ci_text                : JsonOutput.toJson(item)
      ]

      def outFF = session.create(ff)
      def bytes = JsonOutput.toJson(outRow).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
      outFF = session.write(outFF, { os -> os.write(bytes) } as OutputStreamCallback)
      outFF = session.putAttribute(outFF, "mime.type", "application/json")
      session.transfer(outFF, REL_SUCCESS)
      emitted++
    }
  } else {
    // 2) legacy arrays
    def pn = (cinfo.plant_name ?: []) as List
    def bt = (cinfo.botanical_name ?: []) as List
    def ds = (cinfo.description ?: []) as List
    def qt = (cinfo.quantity ?: []) as List
    def qu = (cinfo.quantity_units ?: []) as List
    def pl = (cinfo.production_location ?: []) as List
    def iu = (cinfo.inputs_used ?: []) as List
    int n = [pn.size(), bt.size(), ds.size(), qt.size(), qu.size(), pl.size(), iu.size(), 0].max()

    if (n > 0) {
      (0..<n).each { i ->
        def item = [
          plant_name          : (i < pn.size() ? pn[i] : null),
          botanical_name      : (i < bt.size() ? bt[i] : null),
          description         : (i < ds.size() ? ds[i] : null),
          quantity            : (i < qt.size() ? qt[i] : null),
          quantity_units      : (i < qu.size() ? qu[i] : null),
          production_location : (i < pl.size() ? pl[i] : null),
          inputs_used         : (i < iu.size() ? iu[i] : null)
        ]

        def outRow = [
          application_id         : app.application_id,
          idx                    : (i+1),

          application_no         : app.application_no,
          status_code            : app.status_code,
          status                 : app.status,
          event_ts               : app.event_ts,

          deleted                : app.deleted,
          naeb_application       : app.naeb_application,
          ralis_users_deleted    : app.ralis_users_deleted,
          ralis_categories_deleted: app.ralis_categories_deleted,
          ralis_processes_deleted: app.ralis_processes_deleted,

          ralis_users_id         : app.ralis_users_id,
          ralis_users_names      : app.ralis_users_names,
          ralis_users_email      : app.ralis_users_email,
          ralis_users_password   : app.ralis_users_password,
          ralis_users_checkpoint : app.ralis_users_checkpoint,
          ralis_users_date       : app.ralis_users_date,

          ralis_categories_id    : app.ralis_categories_id,
          ralis_categories_name  : app.ralis_categories_name,
          ralis_categories_type  : app.ralis_categories_type,

          ralis_processes_id     : app.ralis_processes_id,
          ralis_processes_name   : app.ralis_processes_name,

          ralis_roles_id         : app.ralis_roles_id,
          ralis_roles_name       : app.ralis_roles_name,

          category_key           : ciKey,
          hscode                 : hscode,
          description            : sOrNull(item.description),
          quantity               : toDbl(item.quantity),
          quantity_units         : sOrNull(item.quantity_units ?: unitFromGeneral),
          plant_name             : sOrNull(item.plant_name),
          botanical_name         : sOrNull(item.botanical_name),
          production_location    : sOrNull(item.production_location),
          inputs_used            : sOrNull(item.inputs_used),

          // shipment fields (NULL if missing)
          packages               : packagesCount,
          packages_type          : packagesType,
          packages_type_name     : packagesTypeName,
          country_of_origin      : countryOrigin,
          country_of_origin_name : countryOriginName,
          country_of_export      : countryExport,
          country_of_export_name : countryExportName,
          country_of_import      : countryImport,
          country_of_import_name : countryImportName,
          arrival_time           : arrivalTime,
          importer_name          : importerName,
          importer_address       : importerAddress,
          importer_phone         : importerPhone,
          application_tin        : applicationTin,
          invoice                : invoice,
          official_documents     : officialDocs,
          items_upload           : itemsUpload,

          // extra shipment fields
          consignee_names        : consigneeNames,
          consignee_address      : consigneeAddress,
          point_of_exit          : pointOfExit,
          point_of_entry         : pointOfEntry,
          means_of_transport     : meansOfTransport,
          route_of_export        : routeOfExport,
          export_date            : exportDate,
          import_permit          : importPermit,

          ci_text                : JsonOutput.toJson(item)
        ]

        def outFF = session.create(ff)
        def bytes = JsonOutput.toJson(outRow).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
        outFF = session.write(outFF, { os -> os.write(bytes) } as OutputStreamCallback)
        outFF = session.putAttribute(outFF, "mime.type", "application/json")
        session.transfer(outFF, REL_SUCCESS)
        emitted++
      }
    }
  }

  // 3) no items at all  one row with shipment fields only
  if (emitted == 0) {
    def outRow = [
      application_id         : app.application_id,
      idx                    : 1,

      application_no         : app.application_no,
      status_code            : app.status_code,
      status                 : app.status,
      event_ts               : app.event_ts,

      deleted                : app.deleted,
      naeb_application       : app.naeb_application,
      ralis_users_deleted    : app.ralis_users_deleted,
      ralis_categories_deleted: app.ralis_categories_deleted,
      ralis_processes_deleted: app.ralis_processes_deleted,

      ralis_users_id         : app.ralis_users_id,
      ralis_users_names      : app.ralis_users_names,
      ralis_users_email      : app.ralis_users_email,
      ralis_users_password   : app.ralis_users_password,
      ralis_users_checkpoint : app.ralis_users_checkpoint,
      ralis_users_date       : app.ralis_users_date,

      ralis_categories_id    : app.ralis_categories_id,
      ralis_categories_name  : app.ralis_categories_name,
      ralis_categories_type  : app.ralis_categories_type,

      ralis_processes_id     : app.ralis_processes_id,
      ralis_processes_name   : app.ralis_processes_name,

      ralis_roles_id         : app.ralis_roles_id,
      ralis_roles_name       : app.ralis_roles_name,

      category_key           : ciKey,
      hscode                 : hscode,
      description            : null,
      quantity               : null,
      quantity_units         : unitFromGeneral,
      plant_name             : null,
      botanical_name         : null,
      production_location    : null,
      inputs_used            : null,

      // shipment fields (NULL if missing)
      packages               : packagesCount,
      packages_type          : packagesType,
      packages_type_name     : packagesTypeName,
      country_of_origin      : countryOrigin,
      country_of_origin_name : countryOriginName,
      country_of_export      : countryExport,
      country_of_export_name : countryExportName,
      country_of_import      : countryImport,
      country_of_import_name : countryImportName,
      arrival_time           : arrivalTime,
      importer_name          : importerName,
      importer_address       : importerAddress,
      importer_phone         : importerPhone,
      application_tin        : applicationTin,
      invoice                : invoice,
      official_documents     : officialDocs,
      items_upload           : itemsUpload,

      // extra shipment fields
      consignee_names        : consigneeNames,
      consignee_address      : consigneeAddress,
      point_of_exit          : pointOfExit,
      point_of_entry         : pointOfEntry,
      means_of_transport     : meansOfTransport,
      route_of_export        : routeOfExport,
      export_date            : exportDate,
      import_permit          : importPermit,

      ci_text                : null
    ]

    def outFF = session.create(ff)
    def bytes = JsonOutput.toJson(outRow).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
    outFF = session.write(outFF, { os -> os.write(bytes) } as OutputStreamCallback)
    outFF = session.putAttribute(outFF, "mime.type", "application/json")
    session.transfer(outFF, REL_SUCCESS)
  }

  session.remove(ff)

} catch (e) {
  log.error('ExecuteGroovyScript error', e)
  session.transfer(ff, REL_FAILURE)
}

attributes-to-ignore-regex.displayName: Attributes to Ignore by Regular Expression
attributes-to-ignore-regex.name: attributes-to-ignore-regex

attributes-to-log-regex.displayName: Attributes to Log by Regular Expression
attributes-to-log-regex.name: attributes-to-log-regex
